website_summaries.verdict: A very versatile cooling headpiece that can be worn headband style or in 11 other ways.
pros: Cooling properties activated by soaking, wringing, then snapping out the cloth
Great for hot climates when working in the yard to keep sweat out of your eyes and face
Loop design stays in place and can be worn in different styles
Also popular with folks with autoimmune conditions to keep cool
cons: Material feels cheap and not cool when wet to some reviewers

customer_reviews.title: ... than any other fabric would be when submerged in cool water and loses the cooling properties after sitting for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does work to block harmful sun rays and is cooler when wet but no more so than any other fabric would be when submerged in cool water and loses the cooling properties after sitting for a minute. I pursued Tough’s website about this product and found that it states nothing about water activated cooling properties and only states that it can help keep you cool from sun rays. This product is a good one and versatile but the products description is a little misleading as to the, “Submerge in water and snap to activate cooling properties.”
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tried and tested at work in a restaurant kitchen and most recently on a 14-mile bike ride. As profuse as I am sweating, there was no need to wipe my forehead. A bit cumbersome putting it on for the first time but I got it now. Will be back to get a couple more.. Order with confidence. It performs well under sweaty conditions...keeps you cool and looks cool as well.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with multiple uses

We have had several Noreasters with major sow amounts this winter and this has been perfect for keeping my head warm since a hat will blow away in the 50 mph winds. I also have MS and that is the original reason I bought this. I wear it when I get home from bowling to quickly help me cool down. A great multi-faceted product!

customer_reviews.title: Great product for outside workers in the summer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cooling neck wrap I have. The other one is from another company. By comparing both cooling neck wrap I must say this one is much better. The main reason its better is because this cooling neck wrap is a little thicker material which allows it to stay wet longer. I have a job where I work outside and when I wear this cooling neck wrap I do not sweat as much compared to not having the cooling neck wrap on. This did not stain my clothes. If somebody used well water on this product, I could see that causing some issues with staining your clothes.
